questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Textures and surfaces

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A textured surface
C) A sports event
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A text on a textured wall
C) A piece of art
D) A natural landscape

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A textured surface
D) A building

What color dominates the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Red

What can be inferred about the texture of the surface?
A) It is smooth
B) It is rough
C) It is glossy
D) It is soft

What is the visual impression of the surface?
A) It looks delicate
B) It looks sturdy
C) It looks fragile
D) It looks transparent

What is the textureâ€™s pattern?
A) Geometric
B) Random
C) Symmetrical
D) Floral

A) Makes it look sleek
B) Makes it look rugged
C) Makes it look delicate
D) Makes it look modern

Is there any visible text or inscription on the surface?
A) Yes
B) No

What does the text on the surface say?
A) A name
B) A date
C) A word or phrase
D) A number

A) Very clear
B) Somewhat clear

D) Not visible

A) 1-2 characters
B) 3-5 characters
C) 6-8 characters

A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

A) Smoother
B) Rougher
C) The same
D) Indistinguishable

How does the text integrate with the texture?
A) It stands out
B) It blends in
C) It is partially visible
D) It is not visible at all

What kind of surface is shown in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Textured
C) Reflective
D) Transparent
